settings.text: Information for urologists and healthcare providers starting or engaged in a partnership with Xialla

settings.heading: About the partnership
settings.row_content: A partnership with Xialla lets you refer patients to buy Xialla from us directly on our e-commerce website. Your patient benefits from the best venous leak treatment. You benefit from a hassle-free partnership. We benefit from your referrals.

settings.heading: Starting a partnership
settings.row_content: To start a partnership with us, just complete the very short form here.

settings.heading: How the partnership works
settings.row_content:
1. We will send you free Xialla samples. Try a couple on patients and keep one or two to demonstrate.
  2. We'll send you Xialla referral cards.
  3. You hand a referral card to a patient.
  4. The patient buys Xialla on our website.

settings.heading: Prescribing Xialla
settings.row_content:
1. Xialla is effective for venous leak-related ED.
  2. For more severe cases, Xialla works well with pumps, injections and oral medication.
  3. Inject before putting on Xialla so the Xialla doesn't interfere with the injection procedure.
  4. Xialla is safer and more comfortable than other rings as it doesn't need to be as tight to be effective.
  5. Xialla can be put on flaccid or erect.

settings.heading: Insurance
settings.row_content: Xialla is not currently covered by insurance.

settings.heading: Benefits of Xialla
settings.row_content:
• The primary benefit of Xialla is effective treatment of VOD.
  • Xialla has several other unique benefits as a result of the retraction of the ring toward the base of the penis.
  • We find customers love hearing about the many benefits and it encourages better effort to achieve success.

settings.heading: Overcoming objections
settings.row_content:
Xialla is different. Some men may find it weird. We try to let men know what a remarkable device it really is, so they won't miss an opportunity to possibly fix their problem, and more.

We let men know that Xialla;

  1. is effective
  2. is loved by many men
  3. is loved by many women
  4. has many benefits that no other ring or medication has
  5. is fully money-back guaranteed
  6. has five star customer support

settings.heading: Sizing
settings.row_content:
• Xialla comes in 3 sizes: Regular, Slender, Thicker.
  • Sizing is by girth only, not length.
  • The patient will choose the size from our website at the time of purchase.
  • We have a sizing chart here as well as on the product order page
  • We advise the patient to choose Regular size if unsure.
  • 10% of users change size to Thicker and 10% to Slender.

settings.heading: Size changes, warranty, money-back guarantee
settings.row_content:
• We will exchange the size for a different size for at no charge.
  • We will replace any broken or defective Xialla at no charge within one year.
  • We will issue a full refund if Xialla is not effective for the patient, or if the patient is dissatisfied for any reason.

settings.heading: Patient support
settings.row_content:
We will fully support your patient with five star customer service.

The patient will easily find the support link at the top of the website and on the referral card.

We fully respect the physician/patient relationship and will refer the patient back to you for medical questions.

settings.heading: Samples
settings.row_content: We will send you a sample pack of Xiallas.

settings.heading: Referral cards
settings.row_content:
• We will send you referral cards customized with your unique discount code, QR code name and office phone number.
  • The discount gives the patient 20% off for life.
  • The card is like a credit card, easy to keep handy and use for repeat purchases of adhesive pads.

settings.heading: Request additional samples or referral cards
settings.row_content:
We're glad to send you additional samples or referral cards at no charge.

Click here to request additional samples or referral cards.
